templates.name: 3DS FEATURE TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Summary*
<TI>As a [persona], I [want to], [so that].</TI>

*Acceptance criteria*
<TI>Scenario: 
Given
When
Then </TI>

*Additional Information*
<TI> (Optional) Enter any background or references such as Swagger specs, tech docs links, etc. that may help with developing the feature.</TI>

templates.name: IMPROVEMENT TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Summary*
<TI>Enter a summary of the Improvement here.</TI>

*Details*
<TI>Enter any details, clarifications, answers to questions, or points about implementation here.</TI>

*Additional Information*
<TI>Enter any background or references such as Stack Overflow, MSDN, blogs, etc. that may help with developing the feature.</TI>

templates.name: EPIC TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Epic*
As a <TI>type of user/persona</TI>, I want <TI>to perform some task</TI>, so that I can <TI>achieve some goal/benefit/value</TI>.

*Details*
<TI>Enter any details, clarifications, answers to questions, and points about implementation here.</TI>

templates.name: 3DS BUG TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Steps to Reproduce*
<TI>Enter detailed steps to reproduce here. More detail is better.</TI>

*Expected Behaviour*
<TI>Enter what should happen here.</TI>

templates.name: 3DS TASK TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Summary*
<TI>As a [persona], I [want to], [so that].</TI>

*Acceptance criteria*
<TI>Scenario: 
Given
When
Then </TI>

*Additional Information*
<TI> (Optional) Enter any background or references such as Swagger specs, tech docs links, number or nature of subtasks.</TI>
